entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
